title: Great falls
description: Jackie and his father return from a duck shooting trip to find his mother preparing to leave home with a young Air Force officer. She tells Jackie that she wants "a less domestic life". Jackie doesn't really understand what has happened but he knows that these things do happen and that life goes on somehow. "... I thought to myself that my life had turned ... it was something that happened to you - I knew that - and it happened to me in this way now." Based on the short story by Richard Ford.
